function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited accessibility to green areas based on socioeconomic status and environmental context","Impact":"Exclusion of low-income citizens from essential ecosystem services and recreational opportunities, leading to social inequality and reduced quality of life","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of green areas, subsidization of transportation costs, and reduction of entrance or membership fees","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, transportation infrastructure, and financial subsidies","People":"Low-income citizens, residents in environmentally disadvantaged areas","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Inequitable access to green areas based on social attributes such as age, gender, and household composition","Impact":"Exclusion of certain demographic groups from essential ecosystem services and recreational opportunities, perpetuating social inequality and reducing community well-being","Mitigation":"Community engagement and outreach programs, targeted educational initiatives, and inclusive urban design","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, educational resources, and inclusive design principles","People":"Elderly individuals, women, households with children","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments, urban planners"}]}
